title: Redeeming the Stallion
description: Carter Simmons has less than a week to do something to save the straight cowboy Stetson Carthswaite from frying in the electric chair. All Stetson's legal appeals have run their course. The judge doesn't care that the prosecutor rigged the jury. The witnesses got away with lying. And no one will listen to Carter's pleas for the truth to come out, and he faces the possibility that Stetson will never want to see him again.Carter Simmons has run out of options. Stetson fights hallucinations, depression, grief, and other violent inmates who seek to take advantage of him. Carter Simmons is his only hope, and time is running out!
